Pongteh Pork.name: Pongteh Pork
Pongteh Pork.expect: Pongteh Pork is a signature Peranakan dish that has been passed down for generations. Traditionally, pork belly or pork shoulder is braised in fermented soy bean sauce, creating a soft and tender texture, yet packs with bold, sweet-salty & savoury flavours.• Raw ingredients are portioned for 2 person• Dish ready in 40 minutes• Best cook within 5 daysCooking InstructionCooking Instruction Pongteh Pork
Pongteh Pork.kit: •Protein: Pork Shoulder •Sauce: Taucu, Soy Sauce, Dark Soy Sauce, Gula Melaka •Aromatics: Minced Garlic, Shallot, Green Onion for Garnish •Other Ingredients: Cooking Oil

Soy Sauce Chicken.name: Soy Sauce Chicken
Soy Sauce Chicken.expect: • Raw ingredients are portioned for 2 person• Dish ready in 25 minutes• Best cook within 6 days
